sentences.en: A wide range of colours and patterns are available.
sentences.cn: 各种颜色和样式都有。

sentences.en: Badges are also available at a cost of £2.50.
sentences.cn: 徽章也有卖的，2.5英镑一枚。

sentences.en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentences.en: Collins was not available for comment on Thursday night.
sentences.cn: 柯林斯星期四晚上没空发表评论。

sentences.en: Details are available from the Hon. Sec. A.R. Bushby.
sentences.cn: 详情可咨询名誉秘书A.R.布什比。

sentences.en: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.cn: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

sentences.en: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.cn: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.en: Meat was available once a week if at all.
sentences.cn: 就算有肉，也是每周才吃一次。

sentences.en: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.cn: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.en: Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
sentences.cn: 利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: The authority must make suitable accommodation available to the family.
sentences.cn: 当局必须给这个家庭提供适当的食宿条件。

sentences.en: The computer is a leveller, making information available to everyone.
sentences.cn: 计算机是公平之物，所有人物都能从中获得信息。

sentences.en: The name of your nearest stockist is available from the company.
sentences.cn: 从公司可以查到离你最近的零售商的名字。

sentences.en: The service covers contraceptive advice and health checks, and is available free.
sentences.cn: 服务项目包括避孕建议和健康检查，并且免费提供。

sentences.en: These are just a few of the many options available.
sentences.cn: 这些只不过是众多可能的选择中的几个。

sentences.en: They have only a vague idea of the amount of water available.
sentences.cn: 他们只是大概知道可用水的总量。

sentences.en: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.cn: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.en: Water and electric hook-ups are available and facilities are good.
sentences.cn: 水和电都可以接通，设施也很不错。

sentences.en: You will find a wide variety of choices available in school cafeterias.
sentences.cn: 在学校的自助餐厅里你会发现有很多饮食可供选择。

phrases.tran_cn: 可用于…的；对…有效的；能参加…的
可用基金；可动用的资金
可用物料；可用材料；良品可使用

trans.tran_cn: 可用的，可获得的，有空的
trans.tran_en: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found
